text.textblock: Part of A-423 described as follows: Beginning at the Southwest corner of A-423; Thence, N. 02
’ W., 1250 feet, along the West line of said A-423; Thence, N. 87
’ E., 1850 feet, along the East line of said A-423; Thence, West, 2850 feet, along the South line of Tyler County, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-924 described as follows: Beginning at the Southwest corner of said A-924; Thence, N. 03
’ W., 1000 feet, along the West line of said A-924; Thence, N. 87

’ E., 1250 feet, along the East line of A-924; Thence, West, 400 feet, along the South line of Tyler County; Thence, Northwesterly, approximately 500 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Part of A-286 described as follows: Beginning at the Southwest corner of said A-286; Thence, N. 03
’ W., 1125 feet, along the West line of said A-286; Thence N. 87
’ E., 1100 feet, along the East line of said A-286; Thence, Westerly, approximately 1800 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
